boat.full_description: Cynthia was built in Falmouth, and spent her early years there, but by 1961 she was registered in Cowes where she remained until 2014. Originally built as a gaff cutter in 1938 her 4th owner had her converted to a Bermudan sloop. In 2014 her new owner converted her back to her original gaff cutter rig and installed her first ever engine.
boat.name: Cynthia
boat.short_description: Cynthia is a one off, built in Falmouth in 1910.
